column5: Nice work fellas.  Toss some pink lipstick on Marc and it would have been perfect.  My parents sell fishing mags at their store including this fine one, I'm lucky enough to read them all for free.  Ooops, I mean I get them at cost.

Got my issue Friday when I got home.  Marky Marc on the cover, sheesh.  Read Sandy's piece first, as usual.  Us gals gotta stick together.  Then the piece de resistance, our very own Moosebunk is in this issue too.  Simply awesome.  Congrats to all.  Joey

OK.  Now that I have finally received my issue, I wonder if someone would drop me a PM and let me know which OFC'rs are in this issue and which page ?   Not having the priviledge to meet any OFC'er yet, all I know are the board names.   Looking forward to putting a face and story to a name.  Thanks folks.
I dunno, something about the right hand and the fins on that fish just don't seem right ( I wanted to be the first).  Moosebunk has been published?  About time, imo.  Goodonya, bunk.

Rich, Mark Thorpe is on the cover, Pete Maina is at the top of page 11, Graftongal (Snady) is on page 87 (its a side view tho) and Moosebunk is on page 93.  Hope I haven't missed anybody.  Anyone let me know if I have.  Cheers,  Joey
Cool. Thanks Joey.  I'll be sure to look for them.  Marc and Pete I would have recongized.

Well folks just got mine in the mail today and jesh this thing is stuffed with more OFC'ers than you can shake a stick at. You don't have to look to far either, there's one right on the front cover Well I can see my plans for this evening are going to change.  Whopper
Don't tell us toooo much...we'll get ours in a couple weeks !
Crap... it snowed here today... thats a two week delay!!  (I know whos on the cover!!)  its not me....
Well that's just great .. another two weeks.   Looking forward to getting mine.
DANG...mine was in the mail box. Guy on the cover needs to read his own moto a few more times... LOL
he brought his smile in the boat, didn't he.

Well, since I've never met anyone personally from the board.  Not yet any way - gonna fix that in about 4 months if everything works as I have it planned.  I'm not sure exactly how many I will be able to idenify based on the board names used here.  After a while, I hope someone can help me out with putting some names to those pics.  Looking forward to receiving my copy.

Dang my northern neighbors   are already getting their's I stated after the last edition that getting mine well before my buds to the north was the only thing I had up on them, well I guess I'm not going to get any mileage out of teasing them this time Thanks a lot Pete  Whopper
Thought he was supposed to "leave them on shore"...... and I'd been practicing so he didn't throw me in the river when I get there...
Mine arrived on tuesday. Great reading.

Maina must have photoshoped the pic,now I think he's gonna wear lipstick and I"ll be sure to plaster it on the cup!Looks like you needs more discipline Actually prety cool,thanks dude,Fornara gave a call last week and said something coming in the mail  Dont be took quick Wayne,You mighht be wearing lipstick too! You can rest assured "Your Smiles will be left on shore "  Pete acts up again,I throw the leatard pic back up !  Congrats to Moosebunk,great piece man wonderful entree  Jack Penny piece about wild animals and your pets is a thinker  Pretty cool,3 OFC writters in this edition Great example of knowledge to be shared by all  very ,very cool

Mine came in the mail yesterday, but it was too crappy out to bother going to town, so I picks up the mail this morning with the dog sled.. and what am I subjected too... Thorpe on the cover...  That must have cost a bundle...  LOL... and yes i do believe there was alot of photoshopping going on there... but not to the fish... lol  looks like they can pretty anyone up!
Heres the cover...  Uhhhgggg....
LOL TJ  Well Pete said after the last edition that they were going to try to close the gap on mail deliveries, it sure looks like they did.  Job well done Pete & Company!  Whopper

Hi,  Yeah, I still can't figure out that whole cover thing. The guy I know over that way never smiles  It truly is a sad state of affairs ... not my fault either, btw ... Dave Olson is our designer - and you all have him to blame  Glad to hear the dogsleds are starting to arrive all over the continent here.  And seriously, some good stuff ... good to see all the OFNER's ... and yeah, great piece Moosebunk!  Pete
Wow.  Front cover is quite an accomplishment.  How do you follow this one?  Is a centerfold in the works?
Well TG,I cant do it with Anna Nicole anymore So I guess that options out One thing for sure,you wouldnt be smiling,you'd be laughing
What a pussy of a job! Guiding wearing a button-down collar. What's next? White gloves?
that hat looks like it photoshopped.. I only say that because of the size of Thorpy's huge rod Do you think I am sexy Hairdo. Not sure how a hat would fit so tight to the dome...
can i buy a  copy somewhere near hamilton?>
You can subscribe  at the link below and you'll have it before anyone else does.  http://www.esoxangler.bigstep.com/
ahhhhhhh-the ol' MARC THORPE EGO POSE. Kinda makes me feel like resurrecting the good old BEST OTTAWA RIVER GUIDE thread. C'MON SOFT WATER!!!!  WTG Marc,what's next-PLAYGIRL ??!!!!???!!!!!
Thanks Marc, Pete & Sandy.  Looking quite forward to this issue.
Hi,  Was a great article Andrew and Sandy continues to do a great job - the casting piece is good ... if you can just get past that "cover thing", sure you'll enjoy the issue Andrew.  Pete
